Modeling Module
===================================================

This `module <https://github.com/OlivierNDO/indoor_object_detection/blob/master/src/modeling.py>`_ houses functions and classes used in model fitting and cross validation.

The source module with all importable scripts is located `here <https://github.com/OlivierNDO/indoor_object_detection/blob/master/src/>`_.

.. automodule:: src.modeling
   :members:
   :special-members:
